price: Dan mereka berkata, "Apakah (patut) kita percaya kepada dua orang manusia seperti kita (juga), padahal kaum mereka (Bani Isrā`īl) adalah orang-orang yang menghambakan diri kepada kita?"
arabic: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَنُؤۡمِنُ لِبَشَرَيۡنِ مِثۡلِنَا وَقَوۡمُهُمَا لَنَا عَٰبِدُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faqālū anu'minu libasharayni mith'linā waqawmuhumā lanā ʿābidūna
